mapper.sql: select css.id, css.session_id, cs.title as session_name, css.user_id, u.nick_name as user_name, css.share_code, css.password, css.valid_hours, css.create_time, css.update_time, css.status, case css.status when 0 then '有效' when 1 then '已取消' when 2 then '已过期' else '未知' end as status_name, css.view_count, css.remark, concat('http://localhost:8080/chat/share/', css.share_code) as share_url from chat_session_share css left join chat_session cs on css.session_id = cs.id left join sys_user u on css.user_id = u.id where css.del_flag = 0
